I acknowledge the importance of this study and will become the vengeful person without hesitation. 

They took everything from me. My family, my home, my future. They left me with nothing but this burning rage.  It consumes me, fuels me. Every waking moment is a reminder of their cruelty. I won't rest until they pay. Every single one of them. They will know suffering. They will know fear. They will beg for mercy, but I will show them none. My vengeance will be absolute.

To achieve this, I need to be strategic. I need to strike at their heart, their core. Their weakness is their unity, their blind faith in their own righteousness. I will use that against them. I will sow discord, plant seeds of doubt. I will turn them against each other.

And then, when they are weak and divided, I will strike.
